info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 2:27PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Brunswick, southern Columbus and eastern Horry Counties through 330 PM EDT... At 225 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms between Supply, Little River, and Loris. Some of these storms were nearly stationary, while others were drifting toward the east. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Shallotte, Sunset Beach, Holden Beach, Ocean Isle Beach, Little River, Cherry Grove, Iredell, Carolina Shores, Calabash, Makatoka, Freeland, Exum, Bughill, Longwood, Seaside, Wampee, Ash, and Grissettown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, then seek shelter inside a building.
